p: 0.25 milligrams (500 ul of a 0.5 mg/ml stock) of purified and dialyzed NS1-WT and NS1-N207Q were injected into a Superose 6 Increase 10/300 GL column (GE Life Sciences) previously equilibrated with 1X PBS. Validation of peaks, detected by UV light, were done by evaluating 2.5 ul of a given fraction by SDS-PAGE and probing with a NS1-speficic monoclonal antibody (7E11).
